name: Extreme Drift - Modified Drift Racing 2017
description:
Choose what you want from beautiful vehicles and start racing! The more you drift, the more points you can earn, the more you can buy new vehicles.



-High quality 3D graphics and Drift control!
-Completely to drift.
-Get ready for fun if you want to drift!

In the game;
-3 different Control.
-14 different modified cars.
-5 drift racing tracks; Training, Garage, Day and Night Port area.
-Different Engine Sound
-Modified cars , police car
-Drif Point sytem
-Color and smoke modified

and more free download extreme drift - modified drift racing game!
